import React from 'react' import { Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { ListGroupItem, ListGroup } from 'react-bootstrap' export const Users = ({ addToFavourites, removeFromFavourites }) => { const selectedMovie = useSelector((state) => { return state.selectedMovie }) const userLoggedIn = useSelector((state) => { return state.userLoggedIn.username }) return (

{selectedMovie.Title}

 {selectedMovie.Plot}

Actors:

{selectedMovie.Actors}

Genre:

{selectedMovie.Genre}

Awards:

{selectedMovie.Awards}

Producer:

{selectedMovie.Production}

Writer:

{selectedMovie.Writer}
) } export default Users
